verbose_text: In conclusion, this study is the first to demonstrate the role for NHE-1 in diabetes induced oxidative-nitrative stress in lens and retina, cataractogenesis, and premature apoptosis in retina and retinal microvascular cells.
evidence: NHE-1 in diabetes-induced oxidative-nitrative stress in lens and retina, cataractogenesis, and premature apoptosis
